alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:24PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSAGE COUNTY... At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Pearsonia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Bigheart... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Sunset Lake... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
